name: crystallization
content:
crystallization noun [U]
(IN CHEMISTRY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of turning into crystals: This syrup is used in baking to prevent the crystallization of sugar. He began by studying the crystallization process of water.
More examplesFewer examplesice/sugar/salt crystallizationThe fine details of surfaces also play a role in crystallization.Signs of repeated melting and crystallization of the planet's crust indicate that Mars is much more like Earth than was previously thought.

crystallization noun [U]
(OF THOUGHTS)
a process in which thoughts or opinions become clear and fixed: This album is a crystallization of what jazz, at its best, is all about. Their unity is a crystallization of diverse but related ideas. See
crystallize
More examplesFewer examplesIn his new movie, we see the crystallization of a different fable.She considers the situation to be the crystallization of all that's gone wrong with the American system.He was a crystallization of the worst parts of every awkward high school student.
